lines: 1. Abanto emeganda,Ne chianga chindabu,Barina ase amare,Kogenda Igoro;Bakorir'okorwana,N'ebibe bi'ens'eye,Ebisieri mbimanorwe,'Babui basoe.
2. Batera Aleluya!Ense na Igoro,Amariogi y'amakano,Arari'obobui;Rituko ri'omogoko'S'ebitongwa bionsi,Emechando n'amakweri,Biaerire bono.
3. Rituk'erio abaya,Nabaumerane,Abakwete n'abasani,Tibagotigana;Amais'onsi ng'arabe,Amarig'asire,Chintakana nachinyore,Abaibori babo.
4. Reta ogotereka,Ngwakweret'ababe,Kora Korika ebuku,Inchwo eri'ogambe;Ika ay'Omonene,'Banto mbaganyete,Oroki'ekemanyererio,Mogambi Omotoria.
